description: Huge Sale! Now only 1 dollar! The ultimate pranks app for WebOS! This app lets you send emails to anyone, from anyone, which is great for email pranks! This app also lets you send Anonymous Texts, which lets you give people messages, without them knowing who you are. The texts sent from the app do not count as texts on your phone bill, so there is no extra cost! This app will be updated periodically with new features! Get it now at its low, introductory price! If you need help, or support, please email me before you comment, i cannot respond to comments! UPDATE: To the review about anonymity, that is not true, it does not redirect through another email, and no one can ever see your message. Please email me before posting untrue statements, thanks. Huge sale! Now you can get replies to all the emails that you send! It's only 1.50 for a limited time only!
versionNote: The long awaited Reply Feature! You can now set it so that you get replies to emails sent out. I am still working on SMS replies (its a lot different). Thanks for the suggestions!
